tool_description: Analyzes schema dependencies and determines the correct order for creating database objects to avoid dependency conflicts.

schema_metadata.description: JSON string containing complete schema metadata

resolve_circular_dependencies.description: Whether to attempt resolution of circular dependencies

error_messages: Invalid schema metadata: Schema metadata is malformed or incomplete.

usage: Provide complete schema metadata to analyze dependencies and generate a safe order for creating database objects during migration.

creation_order.description: Ordered list of database objects for creation

circular_dependencies.description: Identified circular dependencies and resolution strategies
